subject: Gerry Weber Open (Tennis)
Tennis
lead_paragraph: Roger Federer won the Gerry Weber Open for the seventh time by defeating Alejandro Falla, 7-6 (2), 7-6 (3), Sunday in Halle, Germany.
snippet: Roger Federer won the Gerry Weber Open for the seventh time by defeating Alejandro Falla, 7-6 (2), 7-6 (3), Sunday in Halle, Germany.
